content.summary: Detail-oriented Manual/Automation Tester with 2.5 years of experience in software testing, specializing in Python, REST APIs, and automation frameworks. Strong analytical skills, passion for continuous learning, and a focus on enhancing software quality through meticulous testing strategies and cross-functional collaboration.

experience.title: Software Engineer
responsibilities: Conducted comprehensive testing, including functional, regression, and performance testing.
Improved test coverage and automated testing efforts using Selenium and Pytest.
Worked collaboratively with developers and business analysts in an Agile environment.
Performed backend testing, API testing, and optimized testing through SQL and GraphQL queries.
Led the integration of automation frameworks with Pytest and Allure/Html for continuous testing and detailed results tracking.

details.objectives: To create a highly secure, cloud-based solution for data collaboration.
contributions: Led comprehensive testing efforts to ensure seamless functionality across various browsers and devices.
Developed automated test scripts using Selenium and Pytest.
Conducted backend testing and data integrity validation with SQL queries.
Integrated automation frameworks with Pytest and utilized Allure/Html reports for results tracking.
Created test cases and automated them to streamline the testing process.
Ensured the platform's robustness through continuous integration testing using Pytest.
Performed API testing using Postman and GraphQL.

details.objectives: To develop a knowledge-sharing platform that allows users to post questions and provide solutions to others.
contributions: Implemented front-end and back-end testing to ensure the reliability of user interactions.
Automated testing processes for the platform using Selenium and Python.
Conducted load testing to ensure platform scalability.
Led the end-to-end testing process, including functional, UI, and performance testing.

projects.title: Mini Project: Online Coffee Shop Order Website

details.objectives: To design and implement a fully functional e-commerce site.

certifications: GenAI Assisted Coding Using Amazon CodeWhisperer

candidate_attributes_inferred.academic_performance: Bachelor of Engineering: Information Science And Engineering from Alva's Institute of Engineering Technology, Mijar - India
candidate_attributes_inferred.initiative_and_self_learning: Developed a knowledge-sharing platform and an online coffee shop order website.
candidate_attributes_inferred.teamwork_or_leadership_traits: Led comprehensive testing efforts, automated test scripts, and end-to-end testing processes in projects.
candidate_attributes_inferred.communication_clarity: Able to articulate responsibilities, technologies used, objectives, and contributions in project descriptions.
candidate_attributes_inferred.standout_traits: Detail-oriented, meticulous, analytical, passionate about continuous learning and development in the software domain.
